page.title: 06Butleigh Hospital
page.content: The hospital can hold up to{23} people.The patients come from local areas like{Street}and{Glastonbury}.The function of this hospital is mostly to treat{geriatic}patients but they do have some {convelescent}patients.It takes no births,surgeries,or emergencies of any sort.Even so it is recomended by doctors.All emergencies go to{Taunton,Musgrove Park Hospital.} New additions in the past years have been:{the Day Hospital,Day Room,and {Physiotherapy Dept.} Patients have their: {Breakfast}at 8:00 a.m { Lunch }at 12:00 p.m { Dinner }at 5:30 p.m { The staff are very nice. Doctors treat their own patients.{The League {of Friends}raise money for the hospital.
